text:
Hey everyone,

Just following up on my previous post regarding the issue with tracking Google and Facebook leads after the recent API shift. We haven't received any feedback yet and would really appreciate your insights or suggestions on how to resolve this. Has anyone else faced similar issues or found a workaround?

Thanks in advance for your help!

<@U079NTV6GJX> please provide an example.
Currently I can create buttons using hs react extensions only in object page

Hello <@U06PWJMNX5J>, did you got any solution for this?
I'm facing the same issue.

Hello, I have a question regarding Export Contacts, by exporting the contacts in bulk, let's say 10k on contacts is it possible to export as well the activities? (emails, Deal History, notes, tasks, meetings, calls)?
